users.description: ‚ÄúI love not man the less, but Nature more.‚Äù

tweets.text: Today‚Äôs üåß in #Cumbria now meaning we have @EnvAgencyNW #flood alerts in force & 2 warnings in #Keswick. With more rain o/n & through tomorrow may be more to come. #TeamEA working throughout the night / tomorrow. #PrepareActSurvive #floodaware https://t.co/Q0vzR9sVcG

The 1st nest had 16 Brook Lampreys then further upstream 2 more nests each with 3 lampreys.  They were busy moving rocks to make their nest.  These are the smallest and least rare of the 3 species of UK lamprey. 
#Lakenheath #Fens #brooklampreys #ForgottenFishes @AquiferChalk 2/7 https://t.co/QwKihdBO2N

urls.title: Environment Agency silent on removal of pollution goal from performance report
urls.description: The Environment Agency will not be drawn on why it has dropped a target to reduce the number of pollution incidents from a regular report on its performance against environmental objectives, despite requests for an explanation from ENDS.

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency will not be drawn on why it has dropped a target to reduce the number of pollution incidents from a regular report on its performance against environmental objectives, despite requests for an explanation from @TheENDSReport.
https://t.co/6vI9ZC2H8l

urls.title: Environment Agency silent on removal of pollution goal from performance report
urls.description: The Environment Agency will not be drawn on why it has dropped a target to reduce the number of pollution incidents from a regular report on its performance against environmental objectives, despite requests for an explanation from ENDS.

tweets.text:
Me: So @EnvAgency, why have you taken pollution incidents and a target to reduce them out of your performance reports?
EA: We'll get back to you on that.
Me: *twiddles thumbs*
Me: Helloooo? Is anyone there?
EA:ü§ê
https://t.co/Tqd9MZUd24

I am pleased that @EnvAgencyAnglia accepted my invitation to attend tonight's @BucksCouncil Buckingham Community Board for an update on the Christmas Eve floods and what happens next. https://t.co/jE7r8tE82Q

Friday we completed planting 8,000 Broadleaf trees near Clun as part of the @EnvAgency riparian tree fund with Cashmore contracting. Creating new woodland habitat, reducing sediment runoff and improving water qualityüí™‚ù§Ô∏èüå±
#nativewoodland #shropshire #planttrees https://t.co/achbFg3eAR

Southern Water is the worst performing water company in the country, failing on a number of measures. Useful to meet with @EnvAgencySE to discuss constituent concerns on pollution in our bathing waters and actions to hold the water company to account

@Lord_Drainlid @ZacGoldsmith @MayorJPalmer @lewis_herbert @Cambswater @cam_friends @TerryMac999 @greenarteries @MillRoadBridges @CambsOpenMedia @alya_zayed Our wild cousins already do. Shameful and disgusting.

urls.title: thames estuary levels changing | University of Southampton
urls.description: Sea Levels In The Thames Estuary Are Rising Faster Now Than Ever Before, According To A Report Released Today By The Environment Agency, With Contributions From The University Of Southampton

tweets.text:
A team from @OceanEarthUoS helped produce the new @EnvAgency study that shows sea levels in the Thames Estuary are rising faster now than ever before.

Read about the @TE2100Plan report here: 

https://t.co/waaqLex4Nu https://t.co/SkPA0I3Kpm
2 pumps and a water carrier from @DWFRSXchurch are en route to a tractor fire on Pitt House Lane, Christchurch. One tractor is confirmed as well alight. More to follow.

This seems like quite a big story -@EnvAgency drops pollution targets - is it Brexit deregulation - is it realisation that previous performance indicators were unachievable - whats the scoop? It sounds like top down political direction  @BBCPaulMurphy @BBCwestcott @GeorgeMonbiot https://t.co/wDdMUlcD0e

urls.title: Thames Estuary 2100: 10-Year Review monitoring key findings
urls.description: We use some essential cookies to make this website work. We‚Äôd like to set additional cookies to understand how you use GOV.UK, remember your settings and improve government services. We also use cookies set by other sites to help us deliver content from their services. Where we have identified any third party copyright information you will need to obtain permission from the copyright holders concerned. This publication is available at https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/thames-estuary-2100-te2100/tha

tweets.text:
Today @EnvAgency launches its 10 yr monitoring report into #ClimateEmergency related changes to the #Thames Estuary. By incorporating findings to the @TE2100Plan we are adapting to a more #ClimateResilient future. #TogetherForOurPlanet #RaceToResilience
https://t.co/Y9mD2SZ2zl https://t.co/JhF760gcsB
